summary: This document is an email chain from July 17, 2019, forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. An informant provides information about a former Epstein employee who was allegedly approached to recruit girls for Epstein after his incarceration, and details ongoing intimidation tactics, potential witness tampering, and connections to other figures and media outlets.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central subject of the investigation; the informant discusses his post-incarceration activities, alleged recruitment attempts for girls, and his associates.

persons.name: Gordon Ackley
persons.role: Yacht & media outlet owner, licensed microwave wireless operator
persons.context: Mentioned as having a decade-old business relationship with Jeffrey Epstein in the US Virgin Islands, with links to VIGOP organizations.

persons.name: Dennis Hastert
persons.context: Referenced in relation to 'Foleygate' and his predatory nature; the informant consulted for his opponent in the 2006 election.

persons.name: Dylan Howard
persons.context: Allegedly received information about the case, prompting a shift in media narrative from 'Spirit Cooking' to 'Pizzagate'.

persons.name: Bannon
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to a meeting with Epstein within 24 hours of the informant publishing an 'abduction report'.

connections.description: Had a decade-old business relationship, according to the informant.
Met within 24 hours of the informant publishing an 'abduction report'.
Allegedly received information about the Epstein case, influencing media coverage.

events.title: Informant begins communication with alleged Epstein employee
events.description: The informant states they have been in communication with someone since December 2016 who claims to have been an employee of Jeffrey Epstein after his release from house arrest.

events.title: Informant attempts to contact Ms. [Redacted]
events.description: The informant attempted to contact a Ms. [Redacted] but was too late, unaware of the bond hearing time.

events.title: Informant reports resumed communications and intimidation
events.description: The alleged former Epstein employee resumed communications with the informant, attempting to elicit information and engage in manipulation, leading the informant to believe they are more integrated in Epstein's circle.

events.title: Information handed over about false whereabouts
events.description: At the end of March 2019, information was handed over indicating Epstein provided false information about his whereabouts during a proffer linked to his previous plea.

events.title: SMARTech breach and Hastert indictment
events.description: The informant references the timing of the SMARTech breach as linked to Dennis Hastert's 2015 indictment.

keyFacts: An informant reports communication with a person claiming to be a former Epstein employee who was allegedly asked to procure 'girls' for Epstein after his release from house arrest.
The informant describes ongoing intimidation tactics, including veiled threats against themselves and their parents, and attempts to elicit information about the investigation.
The informant mentions a business relationship between Jeffrey Epstein and Gordon Ackley in the US Virgin Islands, with links to VIGOP organizations.
The informant alleges that information was leaked to Dylan Howard at AMI, shifting media narrative from 'Spirit Cooking' to 'Pizzagate'.
The informant references a meeting between Epstein and Bannon occurring shortly after the informant published an 'abduction report'.
